Page.name: HelpPage
Page.text: Eternal Lands Súgó
Ez az Eternal Lands segítö oldala. Itt információkat
találhatsz, amik segítenek megismerni a kezelöfelületet
és ötleteket ad arról, hogyan kezd el a játékot.
- Billentyü parancsok
- Parancsok, amiket bárhol kiadhatsz.
- Társalgás módjai különbözö csatornákon.
- Magyarázat a szövetséghez (guild)
kötödö utasításokról.
- A játék grafikus kezelöfelületének
magyarázata.
- A vének naptára és a különleges napok.
- és rövidítések
- Hasznos tanácsok.
- Gyakran ismételt kérdések kezdöknek.
- Milyen képességeket (skills), szakmát
szerezhetsz az EL-ben?
- Hogyan válasszunk jó jelszót.

Page.name: HP Commands
Page.text: 1/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Gyors billentyük
F1 vagy ~
Nyomd meg az egyik gombot a kettö közül és valamennyi
beszélgetés görgethetö formában megjelenik a képernyön.
Használd a fel és le nyilakat vagy az egér középsö gombját
a görgetéshez. A PageUp és PageDown gombok egész oldalnyit
görgetnek fel vagy le. Ezt konzol módnak is nevezik.
F2
Az F2 gomb megnyomásával a chat ablakba beírt utolsó url
oldalt nyitja meg automatikusan az alapértelmezett
böngészöben. Több módon is megadhatod kedvenc böngészödet.
Az ELConfig.exe (EL könyvtárban) segítségével vagy az
el.ini (EL könyvtárban) fájl szerkesztésével vagy a
kezelöfelület beállítások (options) ablakában (szerszámok
ikon) a szerver (server) lapon (mappa fülön) állítható.
F3
Kapcsold be és ki a "felhö árnyék" opciót, ez a kapcsoló
a kezelöfelület beállítások ablakában a GFX lapon is
állítható.
F5
Megnyitja a szabályokat (rules) tartalmazó súgó lapot a
játék közben. Nagyon hasznos olvasmány, a moderátorok
komolyan veszik a szabályokat és azok betartatását.
F6
Kapcsold be és ki az oldalsó és alsó sáv átlátszóságát.
F9
Indítsd a részecske tesztet: ez egy mások számára nem
látható tüz. Sötét helyeken való látáshoz is használható,
de túl sok belöle lelassítja a játékot (fps csökken).
Megszüntetéshez csak nyomd meg a térkép gombot (TAB).

Page.name: HP Commands2
Page.text: 2/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Gyors billentyük
Tab
Nyomd meg a TAB gombot, hogy lásd a térképet, ahol vagy.
A kék X téged jelöl. Bárhova kattintasz (piros X mutatja),
automatikusan odasétálsz, ha nincs akadály (pl. barlang).
Nyomd meg újra a TAB gombot és újra a játék képét látod.
Bal/Jobb kurzor vagy egér középsö gomb
Elforgatja a kamerát a Z tengely körül (középen maradsz),
hogy más szögböl nézhesd a játékot. Ez kifejezetten akkor
hasznos, amikor iránytüvel tájékozódsz térkép nélkül.
A forgatás sebességét be tudod állítani az el.ini fájlban
vagy az ELConfig.exe programmal vagy a beállítások menüben.
Az egér középsö gombját lenyomva olyan gyorsan forgathatod
a kamerát, ahogyan szeretnéd. (Fel és le is forog.)
Shift + Bal/Jobb kurzor nyil
A kamera finom mozgatása, mint elözö pontban kis léptékkel.
Beállítás ugyanott, mint elözö pontban írtuk.
Hasznos nagy tömegben vagy sürü terepen pozícionálni.
A súgó menüben a lapok közötti váltásra is használhatod.
Fel/Le kurzor nyil
A kamera függöleges mozgatása X tengelyen, 45 és 60 fokok
között. Alapértelmezett a 60 fok. (Egér középsö gomb is.)
Page up/Page down
1. A játék képernyö kicsinyítése és nagyítása.
Az egér középsö kerekének forgatásával is elérhetö funkció.
2. Konzol módban a szöveg görgetése (lásd F1).

Page.name: HP Commands3
Page.text: 3/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Gyors billentyük
Alt + enter
Oda-vissza váltás teljes képernyös és ablak mód között.
Érvénybelépéshez újraindítás szükséges.
Alt+x
Kilépés a játékból figyelmeztetés és megerösítés nélkül.
Alt+s
Váltás ülö és álló helyzet között.
Ez elsösorban zsúfolt helyeken, mint raktár vagy felkapott
arató/bányászó helyeken hasznos, hogy más játékosok is
hozzáférjenek körülötted a nyersanyagokhoz.
A közelebbi helyeken az ülö helyzet udvarias és ajánlott.
Alt+h
Ki-be kapcsolja az összes játékos élet sávját.
(persze csak, ha látni akarod). Alapértelmezés a látható.
Alt+b
Ki-be kapcsolja az élet sáv pontos számértékét.
(csak, ha látni akarod). Alapértelmezés a kikapcsolt.
Alt+n
Ki-be kapcsolja az összes játékos nevét a feje felett.
(persze csak, ha látni akarod). Alapértelmezés a látható.
Alt+o
A helyi beszélgetéseket rajzfilmszerüen mutatja,
buborékban a fejek felett. Ismételt megnyomásra kikapcsol.
Alt+d
Bezár minden nyitott ablakot az adott kliensen.
Alt+w
Ki-be kapcsolja az "ablakok felül" opciót. Bekapcsolt
helyzetben a térkép és a konzol módban is felül lesznek
az ablakok (pl. raktár, gyártó ablak).
Ez a lehetöség a beállítások ablak HUD lapon is állítható.

Page.name: HP Commands4
Page.text: 4/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Gyors billentyük
Ctrl+e
Ki-be kapcsolja az enciklopédia ablakot.
Ctrl+h
Ki-be kapcsolja a segítség (kérdöjel ikon) ablakot.
Ctrl+a
Ki-be kapcsolja a tulajdonságok (attributumok) ablakot.
Ez a statisztika (grafikon ikon) menüben is elérhetö.
Ctrl+o
Ki-be kapcsolja az beállítások (options) ablakot.
Ez a beállítások (szerszámok ikon) menüben is elérhetö.
Ctrl+k
Ki-be kapcsolja a tudás (könyvek) ablakot.
Ez a statisztika (grafikon ikon) menüben is elérhetö.
Ctrl+i
Ki-be kapcsolja a leltár (inventory) ablakot.
Ez a kézi poggyász (zsák ikon) menüben is elérhetö.
Ctrl+m
Ki-be kapcsolja a gyártás (manufacture) ablakot.
Ez a lehetöség a kalapács és üllö ikonnal is elérhetö.
Ctrl+s
Ki-be kapcsolja a varázslás (spells) ablakot.
Ez a lehetöség a varázspálca ikonnal is elérhetö.
Ctrl+b
Ki-be kapcsolja a haver lista ablakot.
Ez a lehetöség a 3 emberalak ikonnal is elérhetö.

Page.name: HP Commands5
Page.text: 5/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Gyors billentyük
Ctrl+n
Ki-be kapcsolja a szövegszerkesztö/böngészö ablakot.
Ez a lehetöség a jegyzetlap ikonnal is elérhetö.
Ctrl+c
Vágólapra másolja a kijelölt szöveget.
Ctrl+v vagy Shift+Insert
Beilleszti az elözöleg kimásolt szöveget a vágólapról.
Mások számára akkor lesz látható, ha entert ütünk a végén.
Ctrl+r
Megismétli a varázslás ablakból indított varázslatot.
(csak nyitott varázslás (spell) ablaknál müködik).
Ctrl+u
Kiválasztja a használd (use) kurzor alakot (mutató ujj).
Többször kapsz küldetések során utasítást erre.
Az egér jobb gombjával kattintva is megváltozik a kurzor.
Ctrl+l
Kiválasztja a nézd (look) kurzor alakot (szem).
Többször kapsz küldetések során utasítást erre.
Az egér jobb gombjával kattintva is megváltozik a kurzor.
Ctrl+w
Kiválasztja a menj (walk) kurzor alakot (sétáló alak).
Ez az alapértelmezés, enélkül nem tudsz menni.
Az egér jobb gombjával kattintva is megváltozik a kurzor.
Ctrl+q
Kilépés a játékból figyelmeztetés és megerösítés nélkül.

Page.name: HP Commands6
Page.text: 6/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Gyors billentyük
Ctrl + up
Visszahívja az elözöleg begépelt sort (alsó üzenet sor).
Ismételt megnyomására az az elötti sort és így tovább.
Ctrl + spacebar
A parancsok és játékos nevek automatikus kiegészítése.
Térkép nézetben: Jobb egér gomb
A térképre sárga X jelet tesz, melyhez feliratot írhatunk
a szöveget enter leütésével véglegesíthetjük (zöld X).
Térkép nézetben: Ctrl + Jobb egér gomb
Eltávolítja az elözöleg beállított jeleket és feliratot.
(zöld jeleket, a sárga jeleket ESC gombbal félbehagyjuk).
Térkép nézetben: Ctrl+f
A térkép jelek szürését engedélyezi: írj be szövegrészt
és csak azt tartalmazó jelek lesznek láthatóak a térképen.
(hasznos, ha túl sok jelölés van már a térképen).
Esc
Törli a megkezdett üzenetsort beszélgetés közben.
(Akkor müködik, ha még nem hagytad jóvá enter gombbal).
Térkép nézetben: törli a befejezetlen feliratot.
Térkép nézetben: kilépés a felirat szürö módból.

Page.name: text
Page.text: 1/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Szöveges utasítások
#beam me
A karakteredet a kezdö szigetre (Isle Prima) a tábortüzhöz
teleportálja. Hasznos, ha gyorsan akarunk messziröl
hazautazni pontot beváltani vagy térképet váltani vagy
menekülünk valaki elöl.
Harc közben már nem lehet használni, PK (játékosölö)
térképeken és Scotty szabadsága alatt sem használható.
#help_me
A segíts nekem üzenet automatikusan továbbításra kerül az
online moderátorok és kezdö segítök részére. A segítök
általában angolul beszélnek, de keresnek anyanyelvi
segítöt is. Ne felejtsd el beírni a kérdésedet a #help me
parancs után szóközzel elválasztva. Ha van online segítö
vagy moderátor, akkor idövel válaszolni fognak.
Ne felejtsd mások is szorulhatnak segítségre, lehet várni
kell míg sorra kerülsz. IP-n menj bárkihez, ha tud segít.
(Például: #help_me How do I eat? - Hogyan kell enni?)
#abuse
Ez egy feljelentést küld az online moderátoroknak a
szabályszegökröl. Csak erre használd, mert Te válsz azzá.
Figyelj rá, hogy megadd ki?, hol? és mit? tett.
A nem tetszik, ahogy rám néz, tiltsák ki kérés nem elég.
(Például: #abuse I am next to JoeCharacter in Portland
Storage and he is swearing in local chat.)
(Itt ahol ülök, nem véletlen állok ott, ál problémákra
adok, ál okot.) (Káromkodtak Portland raktárnál.)
#exp
Megmutatja a jelenlegi tapasztalati pontjaidat és
szintjeidet és azt, hogy mennyi kell a következö szintig.
#pki
Minden megnyert vagy elvesztett élet-halál harcért (PK)
valamennyi PK pontot kapsz vagy vesztesz.
PK pont (a mennyisége függ az ellénfél pontértékétöl);
ez csak azokra a harcosokra vonatkozik, akik att+def
(támadás és védekezés) képessége 130 pontnál magasabb.
Ez a parancs a saját pontodat írja ki.
#storage
Megnyitja a raktár ablakot, hogy megnézhesd miböl, mennyi
készleted van. Ez a parancs csak lekérdezésre való, a
raktárba történö elhelyezésre vagy onnan kivételhez el
kell menni és beszélni az egyik raktáros NPC-vel, kinek
a térképen barna pötty jelöli a helyét.
#sto
A rövid formája a #storage utasításnak, funciója u.a.

Page.name: text2
Page.text: 2/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Szöveges utasítások
#knowledge
Megmutatja a tudástáradat. A kiolvasott könyvek fehér
az olvasatlanok szürke színüek. Olvasni jóllakottan
lehet, könyveket az árusoknál (piros pötty) vehetsz.
#knowledge tetszöleges szöveg
Megmutatja azon könyveknek a listáját, amelynek címe
tartalmazza a tetszöleges szöveget. (pl. sword : összes
könyvet a kardokról) Fehér színnel a már olvasott, szürke
felirattal a még kiolvasatlanokat.
#know - #know tetszöleges szöveg
Az elöbbi #knowledge utasítás rövid alakja, hatása u.a.
#arm
A rajtad lévö páncélok tulajdonságainak listája.
pl. védelem, meleggel, hideggel szembeni ellenállás, stb.
#research
Megmutatja, hogy jelenleg melyik könyvet olvasod és azt is,
hogy mennyi idö múlva fejezed be (EL idö szerint).
#list_perks
Megmutatja mely juttatásokat (perk) (elöny vagy hátrány)
választottad magadnak. Néhány elönyt köpeny formájában is
fel lehet venni (pl. excavator cape - szüretelö köpeny)
Amikor ilyen mágikus köpenyt viselünk, akkor annak hatását
is mutatja a listában. Egyidöben egy köpeny lehet rajtunk.
A Wraith-nál felvett és a köpenyként viselt elönyök hatása
nem adódik össze.
#list_gods
Megmutatja mely Isteneket szolgálod éppen. Nem mindegyik
Istent lehet egyszerre szolgálni. (fórumon keresd).
#msg all
Megmutatja az összes neked küldött személyes üzenetet,
amit az alatt kaptál, amíg távol voltál (afk mód).

Page.name: text3
Page.text: 3/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Szöveges utasítások
#cls
Töröl minden korábbi üzenetet a képernyöröl (személyes,
rendszer és helyi). Természetesen az újabb üzenetek meg
fognak jelenni a képernyön. Képernyöképe készítéshez jó.
#exit
Kilépés a játékból figyelmeztetés és megerösítés nélkül.
#quit
Kilépés a játékból figyelmeztetés és megerösítés nélkül.
#save
Menti a karakteredet. A játék automata mentés funkciója
kereskedés után és kilépés elött müködik.
Fontos szint megszerzése után vagy ritka tárgy találása
után érdemes soron kívüli mentést kérni.
Szerver összeomlás után a karakter utolsó mentett állapota
kerül visszaállításra. Mérlegeld a menés fontosságát.
#day
Tájékoztat a játék belsö naptára szerinti napról.
Néhány nap különlegesebb, mint a többi (jobb vagy rosszabb)
A #day parancs leírja az aktuális nap különleges hatását.
Vannak dupla pontot adó napok és elátkozott napok.
Lehetöség van különleges napot kérni vagy megszüntetni.
egy különleges napot (részleteket keresd a fórumon).
#date
Megmutatja a játékon belüli aktuális dátumot. A holdciklus
váltakozása egyes szakértök szerint befolyásolja a szüret
sikerességét (mini események/event/ gyakoriságát és
hasznosságát, a tárgyak eltörésének gyakoriságát.
#time
Megmutatja a játékon belüli idöt. Az óránkénti szüretidö
vagy újabb különleges nap kezdete vagy napi küldetések
elvállalása vagy leadása szempontjából van jelentösége.

Page.name: text4
Page.text: 4/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Szöveges utasítások
#current_song
Ez a parancs megmutatja az éppen szóló dal részleteit, mint
a címe, szerzöje, teljes hossza és az eddig játszott idöt.
#suicide
Öngyilkosság, igen ez a parancs tényleg megöl és igen,
tényleg elvesztheted a nálad lévö felszerelést, mint más
halálnemnél (harc közben, ételmérgezés, bányaomlás, stb.).
#reset
A megszerzett pontok nullázása az újrakezdés reményének
ígéretével. A reseteléssel elveszted az összes tapasztalati
pontodat (pickpoint), juttatásokat (perk), elöfeltételeket
(nexus) és természetesen a mindösszesen (overall) pontot.
A tulajdonságok (attributes), mint fizikum (physique) vagy
egyensúly (coordination), stb. alapértékre (4/4) állnak.
A megszerzett képesség szintek, mint támadás (attack),
védekezés (defense), stb. a megszerzett tárgyak (item),
varázserejü jelképek (sigil), tudás (knowledge), követett
istenek (gods) és teljesített küldetések (quest) maradnak.
Akkor érdemes resetelni, ha nagyon elrontottuk a karakter
fejlesztését, kisebb korrekció ritka kövekkel végezhetö.
Erröl részletesebben a fórumokban.
#killme yes
A karakter teljes és visszavonhatatlan törlése a
rendszerböl. A karaktert minden felszerelési tárgyával
együtt törlik, késöbbi visszaállításra nem lesz mód.
Törlés elött kapsz egy utolsó figyelmeztetést: Egész biztos
ezt akarod tenni? (You are sure you want to do this?)
Dönts megfontoltan, cselekedj szabadon.
#add_buddy Játékosnév
Felkérést küld a beírt nevü játékosnak, hogy legyünk
haverok (buddy). A felkérés elfogadása egyoldalú,
a másik féltöl is kell kapnunk és visszaigazolnunk
felkérést a kölcsönös haverlistára kerüléshez.
Ugyanezt elérhetjük a 3 emberalak ikonra kattintva is.
#accept_buddy Játékosnév
Elfogadja a felkérést. Részleteket l. elözö pontban.
#change_buddy Játékosnév szám
Megváltozik a haverság típusa (különbözö színeket lehet
hozzárendelni. Sok haver esetén érdemes kategorizálni.
#clear_buddy
Kiüríti a haverlistát. Kezdj tisztalappal.
#del_buddy Játékosnév
A megadott nevü játékos törlése a listáról.
#set_privacy be/ki
Titoktartás be vagy kikapcsolása. Annak beállítása, hogy
elfogadja vagy sem a haver felkéréseket.
Bekapcsolt állapotban elrejti a karakter statisztikáját.

Page.name: text5
Page.text: 5/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Szöveges utasítások
#mark name
Marks your current location in your map.
(Hit tab to toggle map mode on and off.)
#markpos x,y name
Add a marked location from your map at the coordinates
specified by x and y.
#unmark name
Removes a marked location from your map.
#ignore Playername
This will block any message (PM, local, channels)
from this person, so you can't see it.
#unignore Playername
This removes playername from your ignore list.
#ignores
This will show you a list of everybody on your ignore
list.
#ignore_bots
This will ignore all the bots on all the channels,
however it won't affect local chat or PMs.
Typing the command again will unignore the bots.
#filter word
Type #filter word. This will replace the word you type
with "smeg" or whatever word you chose in your el.ini.
Usually people will filter curse words. Smeg is the
default word.
#unfilter word
Type #unfilter word. This will remove the word
from your filter list.
#filters
Shows list of all words on your filter list.
#humor
This turns the npc humor on or off.
The default setting is on.

Page.name: text6
Page.text: 6/6 oldal
Eternal Lands Súgó
Szöveges utasítások
#change_pass oldpassword newpassword
This changes your password. Make sure you write it down
someplace safe, it will not be logged in text anyplace.
Also make sure you do this inside a house ingame, so
nobody will see your chat in case you make a mistake.
#stats
Shows some basic game server information, plus info
about how many players are logged in.
#glinfo
Shows some basic information about your video card
and OpenGL version.
#ping
Shows your current latency (in easy terms, shows the
response time from your computer to the server and
back to your computer again, measured in milliseconds).
#ver
Shows the current version of the game.
#vers
Shows the current version of the game.

Page.name: Channel
Page.text: Eternal Lands Help
The Chat System
- Chatting Hints -
To
speak locally, so everyone around you can hear you,
just type what you want to say and hit enter.
Use
F1 key to see all chat that has scrolled off your
screen. Use your arrow keys or your mouse's middle
button/wheel to scroll up or down.
To
join a newbie help channel, type #jc 1. You will
get a message that says you have entered the newbie help
channel. Once there, type an @ before what you want to
say:
@hey all!
That will let you talk in the channel,
where people (from any map) who are in that channel
can hear you. Local people will not hear you.
To
join a generic channel, type #jc number, like #jc 3.
Use
@ in front of what you say to talk in your active
channel. If you have joined more than 1 channel, you
can use @@number to send messages to different channels,
like
@@1 Hi all
and
@@4 Hi channel 4
To
leave a channel, type #lc number (thats an L, not a 1).
When
you are talking in a channel, your name will have
brackets [Playername]: hi! around it. When you talk in
local, your name will not. Playername: hi!
To
pm somebody (send them a personal message that only
they can see), you type /playername message.
Example: /Playername hello, I'm new!
To reply to the last player who sent you a pm, just
type //.
- Current Popular Channels and Commands -
#jc 1:
Newbie help channel, here you can get your
questions answered. Many newbies and helpful experienced
players are on this channel.
#jc 2:
General help channel, questions about monsters
and advanced questions should be asked here.
#jc 3:
This is the Market Channel, where people go to
buy and sell and trade things with each other. This
channel is strictly for buying/selling/trading, do not
chat about other stuff here.
#jc 4:
This is the general conversation channel, where
you can chat about anything to do with EL.
#jc 5:
This is the role-playing channel, where you can
join in group role-playing.
#jc 6:
This is the contest channel. You can come here
if you want details about an ongoing contest.
This is the off-topic channel. Here, you can
discuss anything, EL-related, or not.
#jc guild:
This only works if you belong to a guild;
each guild has an official guild channel that only people
who belong to the guild can talk in.
You
can "make" your own chat channel. Just add any
number over 100 (just to be safe) to the #jc command.
Once you are in there type #ci to see if it is empty.
Many guilds do this in addition to their official guild
channel so they can invite guests to chat with them.
#ci:
this tells you what channel you are on and how many
people are on it.
- Guild Chat Commands -
#gm message:
Similar to a guild channel, this lets you chat with
your guild members even if you all are in different
channels. The messages will show up in blue.
Requires rank 5.
#ig guildtag message:
Like #gm, but for the guild you specified by their tag.
Examples: #ig eg hi everybody in EG!; #ig *o* hey *O*!
Requires rank 6.
#ig_block guildtag:
Blocks messages from that guild.
Requires rank 18.
#ig_unblock guildtag:
Unblocks messages from a guild.
Requires rank 18.
#ig_block_list:
Lists all blocked guilds.

Page.name: guild
Page.text: Eternal Lands Help
Guild Commands
- Commands for Guild Leaders and Members -
#make_guild
Creates your guild. You MUST have a skill (not overall)
at level 39 or higher, and 30kgc in your inventory.
#destroy_guild
Deletes the guild permanently. (You must have rank 20 to
do this)
#set_name
Sets your guild name. Guild names have to be unique. Only
guild masters (rank 20) can do this. The name can be
changed at a later time.
#set_desc
Sets a guild's description. Something like: "Our guild is
kewl, and we kill players and we gather in Portland,
Requires rank 10.
#set_url
This sets the guild's website URL, so people can see the
guild website.
Requires rank 10.
#set_join_info
This sets the join info field, so people can know what
your guild requires to be able to join.
Requires rank 10.
#change_owner playername
This allows you to give your guild to somebody else who
is a member of your guild. Once you do this, you go to
rank 19, and the new guildmaster gets rank 20.
Requires rank 20. (means you have to be the guild master
to do this)
#set_short_name (4 letters/number/symbols here)
This option allowes you to create a guild tag for your
guild. (Example: #set_short_name *CO* ).
Requires rank 19.
#join_guild guildname
Join a guild. You need at least a skill at 20. You
must type in the full written out name of the guild,
not their tag.
#leave_guild
Leave your guild, you can't join another guild for
2 ingame days.
#accept playername
Accepts somebody into the guild.
Requires rank 15.
#remove playername
Remove someone from the guild. A removed player doesn't
need to wait 2 days to join some other guild.
Requires rank 19.
#change_rank playername rank#
Change someone's rank/privilege
(Example: #change_rank playername 5 ).
Requires rank 19.
#ig guildtag message
For all the guild messaging commands see
#guild_info guildtag
Gets you info about a guild. (Example: #guild_info EG )
#jc guild
Joins you to your guild's official channel.
#rank
Shows your guild rank.
To see the guild rank of any member ranks 19+ can add
a member name after the command.
#list_guild
Lists all guild members.
Requires rank 5.
#set_guild_color guildtag color
Set a color for the tag of that guild (only members of
your guild can see it).
Note that currently the default color can't be restored.
Requires rank 18.
#view_guild_colors
Shows the guild tags set to non-default color.
- Commands for Guild Wars and Alliances -
#set_ally_guild guildtag
Set alliance with a guild: members of your guild won't
be able to attack allies even in PK maps.
Note that the other guild members will still be able to
attack your guild members in PK maps, unless a mutual
alliance is set.
Requires rank 18.
#unset_ally_guild guildtag
Break alliance with a guild.
Requires rank 18.
#allies_list
List the guilds you are ally with.
#set_enemy_guild guildtag
Declare war to a guild.
If the war declaration is mutual, the guilds will be at
Total War: it means that at night members of the 2 guilds
will be able to fight on every map (except Isla Prima
and the Underworld).
Note that you get no exp for fights in non-PK maps, but
you still lose items or rostogol when dying.
This command costs 1kgc and requires rank 18.
#unset_enemy_guild guildtag
Declare peace.
This command costs 5kgc and requires rank 18.
#enemies_list
List the guilds you are enemy with.
#enemy_combatant
Use this to set yourself as fighter in the Total Wars.
After using this command, a player will be able to fight
(and so being attacked too) in the Total Wars.
This command is free.
By default, everyone starts as non-combatant.
#enemy_pacifist
Use this to set yourself as non-fighter in the Total Wars.
After using this command, a player won't be able to fight
(nor being attacked) in the Total Wars.
This command costs 50kgc.
By default, everyone starts as non-combatant.
#frags
For every kill/death in a Total War fight, your guild
earn/lose 1 frag point.
This command shows the current score of your guild.

Eternal Lands Help

View options
BLUE BAR:
This is your "ethereal points" level.
Ethereal points are also known as mana, this is what
you need to cast magic spells. You can raise this by
getting the attributes will and/or vitality.
YELLOW BAR:
This is your food level. You need to keep
this level over 0 so you can research (read books) and
automatically heal (1 hp per minute). You keep your food
level up by eating fruits, veggies, bread, or cooked meat.
You do not lose health (red bar) if your food level goes
below 0, but you do not automatically heal either.
RED BAR:
This is your health level, also called your
"material points". This always needs to be over 0,
or else you die. You can raise your total possible
amount by getting the attributes physique and/or will.
To immediately heal yourself to a full red bar, you can
use healing magic spells or healing potions.
THE BROWN BAR:
This tells you how much emu (EL's measurement of weight,
the "Energy Matter Unit") you have remaining to be able
to carry. Once you are full (bar shows totally brown at 0
remaining), you cannot carry any more. You can increase
your total carry amount by getting the attributes
physique and/or coordination.
THE GREEN BAR:
This shows you how much experience you have remaining
until the next level. It is set by default on Overall,
but you can change it to show any skill you like by
clicking on your stats icon (picture of bar graph)
and clicking on the name of the skill you would
like to show. (Example: harvest, alchemy, magic, etc.).

Page.name: HP Interface2
Page.text: Page 2/2
Eternal Lands Help
Interface
Mouse right click icons:
Cursor
on person:
right click with mouse on person to scroll through
these icon choices: look at, trade with, attack.
Cursor
on animal/monster:
right click on animal to scroll through these
icon choices: look at, attack.
Cursor
on harvestable:
right click on harvestable to get either look at (eye)
or harvest (pickaxe) icon.
Cursor
in inventory window:
right click on item in your inventory window to get
these icon choices: look at, use, use with, drop (hand
pointing down).
Compass Coordinates
Coordinates are easy to use if you remember
a few simple things:
Click the compass in the lower-right corner of your
screen to display your current coordinates.
The bottom left hand corner of the map is location 0,0.
Moving North will increase the second coordinate.
Example: you start at 20,20. Move one step North,
you'll be at 20,21.
Moving East will increase the first coordinate.
Example: you start at 20,20. Move one step East,
you'll be at 21,20.
Moving South will decrease the second coordinate.
Example: you start at 20,20. Move one step South,
you'll be at 20,19.
Moving West will decrease the first coordinate.
Example: you start at 20,20. Move one step West,
you'll be at 19,20.
On
the left side of your map screen (tab key), you can
see the coordinates of your cursor over the map.
So if you have the coordinates of a specific location,
all you need to do is move your cursor as described above
until it shows the right cursor position and click
on the map. You will then start to walk there.
This may not work in all places, since there might be no
direct path to your target destination.

Page.name: tips
Page.text: Eternal Lands Help
Tips
If
you are planning on making a test character to try
out the game or experiment on your character's looks
first, please still follow the name creation rules. Any
obscene names or utterly stupid senseless names such as
kdjfgli4577dl WILL be deleted, no matter what their
purpose.
You
need to eat food (fruits, veggies, bread, cooked
meat) to keep your food level (yellow bar) over 0. When
your food level is over 0, you automatically heal 1 hp
per minute.
The
Tutorial NPC (located right near wraith where you
first entered the game) offers mini quests which help you
learn how to navigate around EL. You get free armour and
a weapon when you complete it.
The
Tutorial NPC (located right near wraith where you
first entered the game) can heal you until you get your
attack skill to 17.
There
are several ways to adjust your ingame picture
and angle. You can use your left, right, up, and down
arrow keys, or move your mouse up/down or side to side
while holding your mouse's middle button/wheel down at
the same time.
For
combat training, start out in this order: rabbits,
rats, beavers, deer. You should not move on to the next
animal until you can safely fight rabbits with no health
loss. Don't forget to eat to maintain a positive food
level. To engage the animal in fighting, make sure you
are close to it and just click on it. You should see your
cursor turn into a little sword when it is over the
animal.
Food
can be bought at the taverns (orange dots on your
map). Veggies and fruit can be harvested, and bread can
be found on the ground in bags on the path near the
docks.
If
you die while fighting animals, you will end up in
the underworld. To get out of the underworld, you need to
head north (use your compass on the right of your
screen) until you come to some large orange steps with
candles on each side. That is the exit.
You
can sell raw meat and rabbit furs at the tavern for
gc (EL's currency, "Gold Coins"), or you can cook the
raw meat over a burning campfire for food.
The
easiest way to make gc is to sell flowers that you
harvest at a flower shop (pink dots on your tabbed map).
The
EL forums are a great way to get more help and
information. Also click on the encyclopedia tab for more
detailed information on anything mentioned here.
EL
also has some great fan help sites, well worth the
reading.
To
leave Isla Prima (the map you are on), you can walk
down to the docks and click on the flag on the ship you
see there. That will transport you to Lakeside.
An
easy way to mark points on your tabbed map: right
click on the spot you want to mark (that will make a
yellow x), then type what you want to call it, then hit
enter. That will make your x and location name green and
will stay there until you remove it. To remove it, go
back into your tabbed map, and hit your ctrl key and
right click on the x. That will remove both the x and the
name.
You
can get harvest experience for the first 120 items
you harvest per EL hour. Once you have finished that
amount, you will get no more experience until the new
hour. You can continue harvesting to gather the item. You
must be logged in when the new hour starts in order to
be able to get experience for that hour.

Page.name: NFAQ
Page.text: Page 1/2
Eternal Lands Help
Newbie FAQ
I'm new, what do I do?
Well the easiest way to start is to visit the Tutorial
NPC who is located right near the Wraith where you
first joined the game. He will teach you some basic EL
skills, such as harvesting, hunting animals, and finding
your way around the maps. When you are done with him,
he will give you free armour and a weapon.
What is a HUD?
The HUD (Heads Up Display) is the brown
bar at the bottom and right of your screen that has all
your icons and information bars on it.
What is this "console" I hear people talk about?
The phrases "console" and "F1" mean the same thing. Your
console mode is where all your chat is located since you
last logged on. If you hit your F1 key, or your computer
monitor icon in your HUD, it will show a black screen
with all of your chat that has rolled off your screen.
You can scroll up or down with your arrow keys to see
everything that was said.
How do I eat?
Click on your "use" icon (the pointy finger)
at the bottom of your screen on the HUD. Then
click on your food item that is in your inventory.
How do I see my inventory?
Click on the bag icon in your HUD. That will open up
your inventory and you can see everything in your bag.
How do I read my books?
Click on the "use" icon at the bottom of your screen
and then click on the book in your inventory.
It will disappear and you will get a message saying
you are researching "such and such book".
How do I know what level I am?
Click on the bar graph icon in your HUD and that will
bring up a chart that shows all your skill levels
and your nexuses and attributes.
How do I walk?
Click on the "walk" icon (first one from the left)
and just click the ground a little ways away.
You will walk to that spot. You can also hit your "home"
key and you will walk forward 1 step. For more advanced
walking, hit "tab" key and click on the spot you want to
get to on the map. Hit tab again, and you will see
yourself walking to that spot!
Does sitting make me heal faster?
When sitting, every minute there is a little chance to
regenerate 2hp instead of only 1hp.
It also looks nice for roleplaying.
However it IS the courteous thing to do when you are at a
storage or mining/harvesting something. It lets more
people be able to reach around you to click on the
storage npc or item being mined/harvested.
Can you give me free stuff?
No. Everyone here started as a newbie and had to learn
how to make money and get items on their own.
Please don't ask that in this game.
It will only make the other players annoyed with you.
How do I look at the map to know where I am?
Click on your tab key or the map icon on your HUD.
You are where the blue X is on the map.
Help! I died and don't know where I am or how to get out!
You have landed in the underworld. To get out, you
need to head north until you reach the huge set of orange
steps with candles on each side. That is the exit.
What is the easiest and fastest way to make money?
Kill rabbits and sell their fur and meat to any tavern
(orange dots on maps). You can also harvest flowers and
sell them to any flower shop (pink dots on maps).

Page.name: NFAQ2
Page.text: Page 2/2
Eternal Lands Help
Newbie FAQ
Can somebody heal me?
Please don't ask people to heal you. If there are any
healers around, they will heal you if they want to.
Odds are they are more likely to do so if you do NOT ask.
Tutorial NPC will heal you if your attack is below 17.
How do I cook meat?
First you need to find a burning campfire.
You need to click on your "use with" (fist) icon, then
drag the raw meat over to the fire and click again right
on the fire to "drop" the meat. It will automatically
show up then in your inventory as cooked meat.
How do I start a fire?
You need to find an outdoor campfire, such as the one
at the beam point on Isla Prima. You then need a
fire essence (see alchemy in the encyclopedia) and
a branch or log. Click on your "use with" (fist) icon,
then click on your log and drag it over to the campfire.
Click again to drop it. You will get a white message
saying "you have put logs on the fire". Repeat with the
fire essence. Your fire should burst into blaze.
Where can I get swords and armour?
You can do the 3 mini quests of the Tutorial NPC right
near Wraith (where you first entered the game).
He offers free armour and a weapon when you successfully
complete them. You also can buy them from blacksmith shops
or other players but first you need to earn some money.
How do I equip weapons and armour?
Click on the item and drag it to one of the 8 squares
on the right side of your inventory window.
You may equip up to 8 items at one time.
Where do I find more quests?
To find quests explore the maps and talk to the NPCs you
meet (people with a blue name), some of them could have a
quest for you; some quests are easy, but some are difficult
and require you to go in dangerous places: wait till you
are more experienced before trying to complete them.
What attributes/perks/nexuses should I get?
Go to the Wraith and read each description.
That is something you need to decide for yourself.
How do I get the books I need from the library?
You don't get books from the library, you get books
from the booksellers. The booksellers are spread out all
across EL, check your encyclopedia for exact locations.
What is the Joker?
The Joker is an NPC (non-playing character) that spawns
randomly on all of the maps. If you find him and click
on him, you will win a prize as long as you have a slot
and emu available to carry it. Once somebody finds him,
he disappears and respawns someplace else.
How long is an ingame hour?
An ingame hour is just about as long as a real life hour,
give or take a minute.
It isn't exact down to the second, but close enough.
Why do we have wine/ale/mead if I can't drink it?
Wine, ale, and mead are used in potion making.
You can learn about potions in the encyclopedia.
What is a bot?
A bot is a character that is controlled by a program
instead of a person, and must follow a special set of
ingame rules.
All the info and rules about bots can be found in the
of the EL forums.

Page.name: SFAQ
Page.text: Page 1/2
Eternal Lands Help
Skills FAQ
What is.....?
Harvesting:
This skill lets you collect the resources found in the
Eternal Lands. Almost every other skill needs the items
you mine or harvest, so this is a good useful way to start
getting experience. To harvest flowers, herbs, fruits and
vegetables, you do not need any tools. You need leather
gloves to harvest cactus and sulphur, and a pickaxe to
harvest coal, quartz, gems, and metal ore. You also need
the appropriate knowledge (book reading) and nexuses to
harvest quartz and higher.
Manufacturing:
A skill to make clothing, weapons, and armour.
To manufacture something you need the appropriate
ingredients and tools (check encyclopedia) in your
inventory. You will also need the appropriate knowledge
and nexuses to manufacture most items. Manufacturing is
done in the Manufacturing window (hammer and anvil icon).
Click the ingredients to move them to the slots, then
click Mix to make the item. You need a positive food
level to be able to manufacture any item. The higher
your skill level, the less you will fail.
Alchemy:
Alchemy is the making of metal bars (used in
manufacturing and some potions), and essences used in
magic spells. Alchemy is also done in the Manufacturing
window (hammer and anvil icon). Click the ingredients to
move them to the component slots, then click Mix to make
the item. You need a positive food level to be able to
use your alchemy skill. The higher the skill the less
you will fail in alchemy.
Potions:
This skill lets you make all kinds of potions
that can help you in all skills. To make potions you need
vials, the appropriate ingredients and a Mortar and
Pestle in your inventory. As with all skills, you will
also need the appropriate knowledge and nexuses. Potions
are made in the Manufacturing window (hammer and anvil
icon). Click the ingredients to move them to the slots,
then click Mix to make the potion. You need a positive
food level to be able to make any potion.
The higher your skill level, the less you will fail in
potionmaking.

Page.name: SFAQ2
Page.text: Page 2/2
Eternal Lands Help
Skills FAQ
What is.....?
Magic:
A skill for spellcasters. There are many helpful
and fun spells available to the student of the magic
arts, but this is the only skill with required levels
for each spell. The higher your skill level, the better
and more powerful spells you are allowed to attempt. To
cast any spell you need the correct sigils (purchased
from magic shops) and essences (either made by an
alchemist, or purchased from magic shops). Sigils are
permanent, meaning: once bought they will remain forever.
To cast a spell you need to have the appropriate
essences in your inventory. Then open your Sigils window
(magic wand icon). Your sigils are contained here. Click
the sigils in the correct order and then click Cast to
invoke the magic spell. Magic uses ethereal points, also
called mana (your blue bar).
Summoning:
A skill to summon living creatures from a set of
ingredients. Summoning is a popular skill for advanced
fighters, since you can use these creatures to attack
opponents. Many summon just for fun also. Summoning is
done in the Manufacturing window (hammer and anvil
icon). Click the correct ingredients to move them to the
slots, then click Mix to summon the creature. These
creatures have a short life span. You need a positive
food level to be able to use your summoning skill. The
higher your skill level, the less you will fail in
summoning.
Attack:
A skill that determines your chances to hit an opponent
and to deliver some damage. With a higher skill
level comes the ability to "see" your opponent's
weaknesses, and thus allowing you to land more
successful blows.
Defense:
A skill that allows you to dodge attacks from your
opponent. With a higher skill level comes the ability
to "see" your opponent's offensive strategies, and thus
allowing you to react to and avoid those attacks.
Crafting:
A skill for more advanced players. This is where you make
"jewelry"...rings and medallions, both plain and magical.
Your teleport rings and fighting medallions are the most
popular items made with this skill.However this skill
requires a LOT of reading, gold and silver bars
(alchemy), plenty of gc, and at least one artificial
nexus to even attempt to start. You need a positive food
level to craft, and the higher your skill level,
the less you will fail making items.

Page.name: Passwords
Page.text: Eternal Lands Help
Choosing Passwords
Creating Strong Passwords:
Passwords are often guessed, or 'cracked' by trying
common words, phrases, sequences of characters, or
personal information as passwords. Therefore, simple
passwords should be avoided, such as 'pass', or your
username.
The strongest passwords are longer, and contain upper
and lowercase letters, digits, and symbols. A good
idea is to create passphrases which are easy for you
to remember but hard for others to guess, and make
your passwords from the starting letters.
For example, I might use 'Iw2faRS', standing for 'I
want to find a Rostogol Stone'. This would be very hard
for somebody else to guess, even using a dictionary
attack.
Good Password Practices:
However, password strength isn't the only thing you may
have to worry about. Here are some other tips which you
should remember when choosing a password:
* Use passwords you can remember; A strong password
will be useless if you write it down, and it is found.
This also applies to the built-in password memory in
el.ini - if your computer is compromised, or shared,
someone else will likely discover your password.
* Don't reuse passwords you have for other accounts or
services. If somebody finds out one password, you
might lose far more than your Eternal Lands account.
* Change your password if you suspect someone may know
it, or be easily able to guess it. You can change it
often if you want extra security, using #change_pass.
* Finally, never, NEVER give your password to anybody.
Doing so is not only foolish, but also breaks rule #4.
Remember, if you lose your account this way, you'll
have no help getting it back!

Page.name: Calendar
Page.text: Eternal Lands Súgó
Calendar of the Elders
The world of Draia uses it's own calendar.
This calendar is known as the Calendar of the Elders.
It has a year of 360 days, and each day is 6 hours long.
The Elder-year has 12 months of 30 days, each month is
divided into five 6 day periods.
~ The Months ~
Aluwia
Aluwia marks the beginning of the Elder year. It is the
first month of spring, also know as Month of Aluwen,
The birth or The beginning.
Seedar
The second month is Seedar. This month is a month spent
planning, planting, and preparing.
Also know as Seed-time.
Akbar
Rain month. Prayers go to the hope for rain. With the aid
of Centau the lands may be blessed with water.
End of spring.
Zartia
The month of beauty. Flowers are abundant and the lands
are fertile. Name from Zarin, the Goddess of Beauty and
the Arts.
Elandra
Midsummer, the peak of summer which is a blessing in some
parts and a hot dry month in the rain/dry season parts.
Name from Elandria.
Viasia
Month of the mystics, also called Goldleaf.
Wielders of the magical or arcane will feel a special
bond to the lands.
End of summer.
Fruitfall
Time to harvest, beginning of autumn and also a time to
remember lost ones
Mortia
Darkness falls over the lands. This is height of decay.
Supplies not prepared will rot, animals born likely to be
freaks. Followers of Mortos, the god of destruction, hold
this month in high esteem.
Carnelar
Month of wise choices. Winter is coming, it is time to
make preparations. Gathering of supplies for the winter,
many sacrifices to the gods. End of fall.
Nimlos
Sometimes referred to as "the flake" or "the end"
Beginning of winter/rain season.
Chimar
The Month of the Chimeran wolves. A harsh cold month even
the rain forests/jungles are colder than usual.
Vesepia
Month of suffering and betrayal. Many deaths as supplies
run out. End of winter/rain season.
~ The Days ~
There is no such term as week in the Elders' calendar.
When referring to a date, you state day, month and year.
The days of the Elders are: Aurun, Dranun, Worun,
Mortun, Zarun and Terun.
Aurun
The First Day and the mark of dawn, the first light or
the beginning.
This is a work-day for the commoners.
Dranun
The World Day, where important decisions are taken.
This is a work-day for the commoners.
Worun
The Weather and Godsday, which means that you often do
Temple service.
This is a day of worship for the commoners.
Mortun
The Day of sorrow. The day is in memory of the dead.
This is a work-day for the commoners.
Zarun
The Joy-day, a day of happiness. There is usually some
kind of festival held at night after work.
Terun
The Day of the Loved Ones. For the commoners its a half
day of work, then rest.
~ The Special Days ~
There are many special days: they happen randomly
and unpredictably.
Scholars Day
More experience in any skill, cumulative with the gods
bonus exp.
Role Playing: A group of scholars is visiting our lands,
spreading knowledge all over.
Solar Flares
Today, if you are outside at daytime, you lose 2 hp/min.
Role Playing: Our scientists have noticed a solar
activity increase, so the UV rays and the solar wind are
going to cause damage to all living beings (Isla Prima
not affected). We recommend staying indoors during the
daytime.
Day of the print
Today there is a chance that when you start reading a
book you will instantly assimilate the knowledge.
Acid Rain Day
Each minute you spend outside when it rains, there
is a chance for the items you WEAR to get damaged or
destroyed.
Role Playing: Our scientists have discovered an increase
in the acidity of the rain, due to the increased
pollution from the dwarf and gnome factories. Anyone
being hit by the rain might lose some of the items they
wear.
Day of the Dead
This day, there is a random chance that when an entity
dies (human or computer controlled) it will respawn full
health where it died, without dropping any items or using
rostogol stones.
Role Playing: Mortos has some extra power today, so he
will randomly save any living (or undead) being from
its ultimate fate.
Day of Fasting
No eating this day.
Role Playing: Today is the day when we pay respect to our
gods, wether we respect them or not :D
Reconstruction Day
Today, there is a chance that when you use an item, it
will not disappear from your inventory.
Role Playing: For reasons unknown to us, perhaps a time
space anomaly, some items do not disappear after being
used.
Day of Recycling
Today there is a chance of not losing the ingredients
while using the manufacture window
Role Playing: Today we use the resources in a more
efficient way, allowing for better production of
items and animals.
Scotty's Vacation
No #beam me today.
Role Playing: Umm.. Scotty has to take his cat to the vet
today, so he can't beam you up.
Green Day
No harvesting of any kind today.
Role Playing: Today we honor Mother Nature by not
stripping her off her resources.
Decreased Harvesting Events Day
Today there is reduced chance to trigger random
harvesting events.
Role Playing: Gaia is pissed off today, she declared
that today random events while harvesting will be even
more rare.
Increased Harvesting Events Day
Today there is an increased chance to trigger random
harvesting events.
Role Playing: Gaia is happy today, she is granting
additional random events to those that harvest today.
Day of Aleksei Stakhanov
Experience x3 from Harvesting.
Role Playing: Aleksei Stakhanov is in the town today,
teaching how to harvest resources more effectively.
Scientists Day
No knowledge required today (for harvest, manufacture,
alchemy, etc.).
Peace Day
No fighting today, you can't attack players, animals or
monsters, and the animals or monsters won't attack you
either.
Role Playing: Today we celebrate life and, as such, we
will not fight with each other, nor will we harm any
life form.
Day of the Brave
No fleeing from combat today (not even with diss rings).
Role Playing: Today everyone is so brave, so that no one
can flee from a fight. So all the fights are to death.
No Drops Day
No items drop when players or creatures die.
Rostogol stones will disappear as usually though.
Day of No Rostogols
Today the rostogol stones do not work.
Day of No Grief
Items don't break in combat today.
Role Playing: Today our planet is passing throughout an
area in our universe where the electromagnetic law is
slightly different, and this is causing the armors,
weapons and clothes to never break for the duration of
this day.
Day of More Grief
Higher chances of items breaking in combat, today.
Role Playing: Today our planet is passing throughout an
area in our universe where the electromagnetic law is
slightly different, and this is causing the armors,
weapons and clothes to be slightly weaker, thus
increasing their chance to break.
Day of Sun Tzu
You get double experience for Attack and Defense.
Role Playing: Sun Tzu is in town, teaching people about
how to be better at killing others.
Healing Day
5 health points restored every minute, regardless of
food level.
Role Playing: Today it is Aluwen's birthday, so everyone
get their health restored much, much faster.
Labour Day
No manufacturing (anything requiring the mix window)
today.
Role Playing: Today we celebrate the labour day, by..,
umm not working. Makes perfect sense, doesn't it?
Decreased Rare Manufacturing Day
Decreased rate of producing a better product today while
creating new items (manufacture, alchemy, etc.).
Role Playing: All the gods that patron manufacture
related skills are mad at j00, so that might reflect in
your today's production of items.
Increased Rare Manufacturing Day
Increased rate of producing a better product today while
creating items (manufacture, alchemy, etc.).
Role Playing: All the gods that patron manufacture
related skills are happy, so that might reflect in your
today's production of items.
Day of Murphy
ALL the failures are critical (ingredients lost).
Role Playing: Anything that can go wrong, will.
